message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you still get a good chunk.
That's not fair, Alice.  Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it while it's still good.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a bigger share to compensate for the inflation. Let's meet in the middle.
The deal's getting worse for you Alice, not me.  I'll take a slight edge this time - 550k for me.  Don't wait too long, it'll only get worse!
